channel.title: Reflection on Mmoumni
channel.description: Recent content in Reflection on Mmoumni

item.title: Why i don't watch football anymore
item.description:
Why i don’t watch football anymore

Don’t get me wrong i’ve been a football fan since I was 6 years old. I started by watching matches from our local league in morocco as well as games of our national team. I was obsessed with the sport: team histories, player’s names, and famous figures in the league.

As I got older, I began following international leagues such as la liga in spain and the Premier league in UK, along with major international competitions like the world cup and the African Cup.
